ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
Environmental Violations Administrative Monetary Penalties Act
SubjectFederal Halocarbon Regulations, 2022
PrecisFEDERAL HALOCARBON REGULATIONS, 2022 in order to (1) clarify definitions and requirements; (2) reduce administrative costs for the regulated community; and 3) remove or update obsolete provisions and enhance regulatory alignment with other jurisdictions.
